mapper.select: select a.orgcode "YLJGDM",-- 医疗机构代码 VARCHAR 22 必填 复合主键：采用22位“卫生机构代码” a.deptcode "KSBM",-- 科室编码 VARCHAR 50 必填 复合主键：编码。见科室字典表 to_char(to_date(#{begtime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'yyyymmdd') "YWRQ",-- 业务日期 VARCHAR 8 必填 复合主键：是指业务发生的日期yyyymmdd a.deptname "KSMC",-- 科室名称 VARCHAR 100 必填 医院科室名称 b.item_id "BZKSBM",-- 标准科室编码 VARCHAR 50 必填 CVA2101.09 医疗机构诊疗科室 b.item_name "BZKSMC",-- 标准科室名称 VARCHAR 100 必填 如消化内科专业 nvl(c.num, 0) "HDCWZS",-- 核定（编制）床位总数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(d.num, 0) "SJKFCWZS",-- 实际开放床位总数 NUMERIC 15 必填 0 "BRJCS",-- 本日加床数 NUMERIC 15 必填 0 "BRKCS",-- 本日空床数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(e.num, 0) "ZRLYRS",-- 期初留院人数（昨日留院） NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(f.num, 0) "RYRS",-- 期内入院人数（今日入院） NUMERIC 15 必填 0 "TKZRRS",-- 同科转入人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(g.num, 0) "TAKZRRS",-- 他科转入人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(round(h.num / g.num, 0), 0) "CYHZZYCRS",-- 出院患者占用床日数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(i.num, 0) "CYRS",-- 期内出院人数（今日出院） NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(j.num, 0) "CYRS_ZYRS",-- 出院人数其中：治愈人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(k.num, 0) "CYRS_HZRS",-- 出院人数其中：好转人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(l.num, 0) "CYYS_WYRS",-- 出院人数其中：未愈人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(m.num, 0) "CYRS_SWRS",-- 出院人数其中：死亡人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(n.num, 0) "CYRS_QTRS",-- 出院人数其中：其他人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(o.num, 0) "CYRS_YZLYRS",-- 出院人数其中：医嘱离院人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(p.num, 0) "CYRS_YZZYRS",-- 出院人数其中：医嘱转院人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(q.num, 0) "CYRS_YZZSQRS",-- 出院人数其中：医嘱转社区卫生服务机构/乡镇卫生院人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(r.num, 0) "CYRS_FYZLYRS",-- 出院人数其中：非医嘱离院人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(s.num, 0) "JJBARS",-- 甲级病案人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(t.num, 0) "YJBARS",-- 乙级病案人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(u.num, 0) "BJBARS",-- 丙级病案人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 0 "CYRS_ZYZLRS",-- 住院人员接受中医治疗人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 中西医结合所有科室、其他医院中医科住院人次 0 "CYRS_FYWZYZLRS",-- 出院者使用非药物中医技术诊疗人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(v.num, 0) "CYRS_ZCAORS",-- 出院者使用中草药人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(w.num, 0) "CYRS_ZCHYRS",-- 出院者使用中成药人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 0 "CYRS_ZYFYWRS",-- 出院者使用中医非药物人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 0 "ZWTKRS",-- 转往同科人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(x.num, 0) "ZWTAKRS",-- 转往他科人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(y.num, 0) "ZYRS",-- 期内留院(在院)人数(今日留院，实际占用床日数) NUMERIC 15 必填 0 "PKRS",-- 陪客人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 nvl(z.num, 0) "WZRS",-- 危重病人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 0 "ZYWZBR_QJRC",-- 住院危重病人抢救人次数 NUMERIC 15 必填 0 "ZYWZBR_QJCGRC",-- 其中：抢救成功人次数 NUMERIC 15 必填 0 "CYBRGRRS",-- 出院病人医院感染人（例）数 NUMERIC 15 必填 0 "CYBRSSGRRS",-- 出院病人手术相关感染人数 NUMERIC 15 必填 to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "TBRQ" -- 填报日期 DATETIME 必填 本条数据采集时间，格式YYYY-MM-DD from com_deptinfo a left join (select a.item_id, a.item_name, b.his_item_id from si_yt_report_item a, si_yt_report_item_compare b where a.module_rid = b.module_rid and a.type_rid = b.type_rid and a.rid = b.item_rid and a.module_rid = '202310101511361148853000000000' and a.type_rid = '202311141512391328016800000000') b on b.his_item_id = a.DEPTCODE left join (select count(deptcode) num, deptcode, orgcode from COM_BEDINFO group by deptcode, orgcode) c on c.orgcode = a.orgcode and c.deptcode = a.deptcode left join (select count(deptcode) num, deptcode, orgcode from COM_BEDINFO where BEDSTATE <> '9' group by deptcode, orgcode) d on d.orgcode = a.orgcode and d.deptcode = a.deptcode left join (select count(outDEPTCODE) num, outDEPTCODE, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} or out_date is null group by outDEPTCODE, orgcode) e on e.orgcode = a.orgcode and e.OUTDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(INDEPTCODE) num, INDEPTCODE, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and to_char(indate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(indate, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by INDEPTCODE, orgcode) f on f.orgcode = a.orgcode and f.INDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(a.NEWSUBJECTCODE) num, a.NEWSUBJECTCODE, a.orgcode from ipr_shiftinfo a, IPR_INPATIENTINFO b where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.inid = b.inid and b.instate <> '0' and a.SHIFTTYPE = 'RD' and a.SHIFT_STATE = '2' and to_char(a.UPDT_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(a.UPDT_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by a.NEWSUBJECTCODE, a.orgcode) g on g.orgcode = a.orgcode and g.NEWSUBJECTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select sum(num) num, orgcode from (select case when floor(out_date - indate) <= 1 then 1 else floor(out_date - indate) + 1 end as num, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and out_date >= to_date(#{begtime} , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and out_date <= to_date(#{endtime} , 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') ) group by orgcode) h on h.orgcode = a.orgcode left join (select count(OUTDEPTCODE) num, OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode) i on i.orgcode = a.orgcode and i.OUTDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(OUTDEPTCODE) num, OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and OUTREASON = '1' and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode) j on j.orgcode = a.orgcode and j.OUTDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(OUTDEPTCODE) num, OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and OUTREASON = '2' and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode) k on k.orgcode = a.orgcode and k.OUTDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(OUTDEPTCODE) num, OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and OUTREASON = '3' and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode) l on l.orgcode = a.orgcode and l.OUTDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(OUTDEPTCODE) num, OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and OUTREASON = '4' and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode) m on m.orgcode = a.orgcode and m.OUTDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(OUTDEPTCODE) num, OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and OUTREASON = '9' and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode) n on n.orgcode = a.orgcode and n.OUTDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(OUTDEPTCODE) num, OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and DSCG_WAY = '1' and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode) o on o.orgcode = a.orgcode and o.OUTDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(OUTDEPTCODE) num, OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and DSCG_WAY = '2' and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode) p on p.orgcode = a.orgcode and p.OUTDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(OUTDEPTCODE) num, OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and DSCG_WAY = '3' and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode) q on q.orgcode = a.orgcode and q.OUTDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(OUTDEPTCODE) num, OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and DSCG_WAY = '4' and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by OUTDEPTCODE, orgcode) r on r.orgcode = a.orgcode and r.OUTDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(b.OUTDEPTCODE) num, b.OUTDEPTCODE, a.orgcode from EMR_MEDICALDOCTOR a, IPR_INPATIENTINFO b where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.visit_id = b.inid and b.instate <> '0' and a.MR_QUALITY = '1' and to_char(a.CRTE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(a.CRTE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by b.OUTDEPTCODE, a.orgcode) s on s.orgcode = a.orgcode and s.OUTDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(b.OUTDEPTCODE) num, b.OUTDEPTCODE, a.orgcode from EMR_MEDICALDOCTOR a, IPR_INPATIENTINFO b where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.visit_id = b.inid and b.instate <> '0' and a.MR_QUALITY = '2' and to_char(a.CRTE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(a.CRTE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by b.OUTDEPTCODE, a.orgcode) t on t.orgcode = a.orgcode and t.OUTDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(b.OUTDEPTCODE) num, b.OUTDEPTCODE, a.orgcode from EMR_MEDICALDOCTOR a, IPR_INPATIENTINFO b where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.visit_id = b.inid and b.instate <> '0' and a.MR_QUALITY = '3' and to_char(a.CRTE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(a.CRTE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by b.OUTDEPTCODE, a.orgcode) u on u.orgcode = a.orgcode and u.OUTDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(a.inid) num, a.INDEPTCODE, a.orgcode from (select orgcode, inid, drugtype, INDEPTCODE from ips_feedetail group by orgcode, inid, drugtype, INDEPTCODE union all select orgcode, inid, drugtype, INDEPTCODE from ips_outfeedetail group by orgcode, inid, drugtype, INDEPTCODE ) a, IPR_INPATIENTINFO b where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.inid = b.inid and b.instate <> '0' and a.drugtype = '3' and to_char(b.out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(b.out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by a.INDEPTCODE, a.orgcode) v on v.orgcode = a.orgcode and v.INDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(a.inid) num, a.INDEPTCODE, a.orgcode from (select orgcode, inid, drugtype, INDEPTCODE from ips_feedetail group by orgcode, inid, drugtype, INDEPTCODE union all select orgcode, inid, drugtype, INDEPTCODE from ips_outfeedetail group by orgcode, inid, drugtype, INDEPTCODE ) a, IPR_INPATIENTINFO b where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.inid = b.inid and b.instate <> '0' and a.drugtype = '2' and to_char(b.out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(b.out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by a.INDEPTCODE, a.orgcode) w on w.orgcode = a.orgcode and w.INDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(a.OLDSUBJECTCODE) num, a.OLDSUBJECTCODE, a.orgcode from ipr_shiftinfo a, IPR_INPATIENTINFO b where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.inid = b.inid and b.instate <> '0' and a.SHIFTTYPE = 'RD' and to_char(a.CRTE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{begtime} and to_char(a.CRTE_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') <= #{endtime} group by a.OLDSUBJECTCODE, a.orgcode) x on x.orgcode = a.orgcode and x.OLDSUBJECTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(outDEPTCODE) num, outDEPTCODE, orgcode from IPR_INPATIENTINFO where instate <> '0' and to_char(out_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= #{endtime} or out_date is null group by outDEPTCODE, orgcode) y on y.orgcode = a.orgcode and y.OUTDEPTCODE = a.deptcode left join (select count(b.outdeptcode) num, b.outdeptcode, a.orgcode from INR_RECEIVEINFO a, IPR_INPATIENTINFO b where a.orgcode = b.orgcode and a.inid = b.inid and b.instate <> '0' and a.INTIME >= to_date(#{begtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.INTIME <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and a.PATIENTLEVEL in ('2', '3') group by b.outdeptcode, a.orgcode) z on z.orgcode = a.orgcode and z.OUTDEPTCODE = a.deptcode where a.depttype = 'I' and a.isvalid='1' and a.orgcode = #{orgcode}
